author: Triple S
text:

author: Triple S
text: Film City in UP is a great Initiative BUT it shd be made without Bollywood's intervention..only those Bolly people shd be there who have contributed to real work & hv zero involvement with mafia, drugs, nepotism, ISI & absurdity.. no Akshay, Boney... @myogiadityanath @myogioffice
